fields.name: Stop-In Effect:
fields.value: - Gain a Brick (Chest 70). This will not happen if you stop here due to the Drive-By effect.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Bricks can be used at Brick Wall to add your name to the wall.
- When Brick Wall has 3 names on it, it gains a new Drive-by Effect.

fields.name: Drive-by Effect:
fields.value: - If you do not have your name on the wall, stop at this space.
